member.name: T:Ninject.Extensions.ChildKernel.ChildActivationCache
member.summary: The activation cache of child kernels.

member.name: F:Ninject.Extensions.ChildKernel.ChildActivationCache.parentCache
member.summary: The cache of the parent kernel.

member.name: M:Ninject.Extensions.ChildKernel.ChildActivationCache.#ctor(Ninject.IKernel)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: M:Ninject.Extensions.ChildKernel.ChildActivationCache.IsActivated(System.Object)
member.summary: Determines whether the specified instance is activated.
member.returns: true if the specified instance is activated; otherwise, false.

member.name: M:Ninject.Extensions.ChildKernel.ChildActivationCache.IsDeactivated(System.Object)
member.summary: Determines whether the specified instance is deactivated.
member.returns: true if the specified instance is deactivated; otherwise, false.

member.name: T:Ninject.Extensions.ChildKernel.ChildKernel
member.summary: This is a kernel with a parent kernel. Any binding that can not be resolved by this kernel is forwarded to the parent.

member.name: T:Ninject.Extensions.ChildKernel.IChildKernel
member.summary: A kernel that has a parent for fall back.

member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: M:Ninject.Extensions.ChildKernel.ChildKernel.CanResolve(Ninject.Activation.IRequest)
member.summary: Determines whether the specified request can be resolved.
member.returns: True if the request can be resolved; otherwise, false.

member.name: M:Ninject.Extensions.ChildKernel.ChildKernel.Resolve(Ninject.Activation.IRequest)
member.summary: Resolves instances for the specified request. The instances are not actually resolved until a consumer iterates over the enumerator.
member.returns: An enumerator of instances that match the request.
